item.title: Learning `map()` in javaScript
item.description: Reference Date Title Author URL 2017-05-31 Master Map & Filter, Javascriptâ€™s Most Powerful Array Functions Arnav Aggarwal Link 2014-02-24 how do you pass an array as a parameter in a function? Dave McFarland Link Summary This article adopts a specific-to-abstract 4-stage approach to explain array functions. A quasi-map function is developed from multiplying each items in arr by 3.
